# Everyday Recipes Blog

## Tech

- [React](https://reactjs.org/) - React Styled Components & custom hooks
- [GraphQL](https://graphql.org/) - GraphQL queries the data of the recipes & tags
- [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/) - Contentful is used as the headless CMS service & connected through Gatsby ▹ Slugify creates the SEO URL for each recipe
